summary: A tiger expert, his wife, two tourists and a village chief engage in a battle for survival against supernatural beasts within Jim Corbett National Wildlife Park.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Vivek Oberoi|John Abraham|Lara Dutta|Esha Deol|Parmeet Sethi|Vishal Malhotra|Kushal Punjabi|Vineet Sharma|Daya Shankar Pandey|Vinod Jaywant|Raajan Anand|Vijay Joshi|Gopal Babel|Prem Singh Bisht|Avinash Panday|Randy Miller|Angela De Groot|Shiraz Siddique|Shah Rukh Khan|Malaika Arora
title: Kaal
